itemInfo.itemDesc:
A processed natural resource. It is used in alchemy and processing. 

- Obtained by: Heating rough opal several times. You'll need the knowledge "Heating: Intermediate."

 ※ See Plabiano in Heidel to complete the quest "Pure Water for Experiment" to gain the knowledge.

※ In order to proceed with the quest, you have to reach Gathering Level Apprentice 4 and see Ficy in Heidel to complete the serial quest. Call Black Spirit (/ key) for details.

item.name: Polished Opal
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

item.name: Moonlight Opal
item.desc:
A processed natural resource. It is used in alchemy and processing.

- Obtained by: Heating Metal Solvent and brilliant opal. You'll need the knowledge "Heating: Intermediate."

※ See Vatudun in Keplan to complete the quest "Materials for Skill Learning" to gain the knowledge.

※ In order to proceed with the quest, you have to reach Gathering Level Processional 10 and Processing Level Professional 5. Call Black Spirit (/ key) for details.
